statement.name: INSERT_SMASDY
statement.sql: Insert into SMASDY (NROSDY,CODCIA,NROPRS, TPOSDY,TITSDY,CODUNV, BGNSDY,ENDSDY,SMTSDY, PROSDY,TRJPRO,NOMTIT, CODKLG,TITKLG,SQLBKR) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMASDY
statement.sql: Update SMASDY Set CODCIA=?,NROPRS=?, TPOSDY=?,TITSDY=?,CODUNV=?, BGNSDY=?,ENDSDY=?,SMTSDY=?, PROSDY=?,TRJPRO=?,NOMTIT=?, CODKLG=?,TITKLG=?,SQLBKR=? Where NROSDY=?
